sources.title: Manaos (1979) A treacherous escape through the Amazon inferno, with Fabio Testi
sources.description:
At the beginning of this century some owners of rubber plantations in the Amazonas jungle convert a village into one big prison. But the inhabitants have other plans...

This film has English, German & Italian audio options, and is subtitled in many more languages.

Watch the members only version: https://youtu.be/PdC-XizOkzk


Director: Alberto Vázquez Figueroa
Writers: Alberto Vázquez Figueroa, Carlos Vasallo, Juan Antonio Porto
Stars: Fabio Testi, Agostina Belli, Jorge Rivero, Andrés García
Genres: Jungle Adventure, Drama


Original title:  Manaos (1979) 
Alternative titles: Slaves from Prison Camp Manaos, Amazonjunglens slavelejr, Manaos – Die Sklaventreiber vom Amazonas/ Sklaven der Hölle, 复仇之旅, Vankileiri Manaoksen orjat, Violence à Manaos, Μανάος: Δραπέτης της κολάσεως, Rebelión en la selva, Бежавшие из ада


00:00 Full movie (with subtitles)
03:06 A daring escape through the deadly Amazon jungle.
13:14 A bold plan to flee slavery through the dense jungle.
23:32 The escape faces danger, betrayal, and the fight to survive.
41:48 A perilous journey marked by betrayal and unexpected alliances.
54:56 Fleeing a brutal plantation sparks a call for revolt.
1:04:4: A gripping story of betrayal and revenge unfolds in the jungle.
1:18:35 A thrilling mission to defeat a cunning enemy deep in the Amazon.

@CultCinemaClassics
